2998.definition: to give a talk or a series of talks to a group of people on a subject, especially as a way of teaching in a university or college
2998.example: He has taught and lectured at the University of Pretoria.
2998.translation: 讲课（向一群人就某一主题进行一次或系列讲演，尤指在大学中）

2999.definition: on the side of your body that is towards the west when you are facing north
2999.example: Fewer people write with their left hand than with their right.
2999.translation: 左边的（面朝北时，身体指向西侧的一面）

3000.definition: on or to the left side

3001.example: on the left, Take the next road on the left.
3001.translation: 左侧（左侧的位置或方向）

3002.definition: one of the long parts that connect the feet to the rest of the body
3002.example: Sit on the floor, stretching your legs out in front of you.
3002.translation: 腿（连接脚与身体其余部分的长形部分之一）

3003.definition: money or property that is given to you by somebody when they die
3003.example: They each received a legacy of $5 000.
3003.translation: 遗产（某人死后留给你的金钱或财产）

3004.translation: 法律的，合法的（与法律相关的）

3005.definition: a story from ancient times about people and events, that may or may not be true; this type of story
3005.example: The film is based on the legend of Robin Hood.
3005.translation: 传说（关于人物和事件的古代故事，真假不一；这种文体）

3006.definition: very famous and talked about a lot by people
3006.translation: 传奇的（非常出名且常被人们谈论的）

3007.definition: a law or a set of laws passed by a parliament
3007.translation: 立法（议会通过的一项或一套法律）

3008.definition: connected with the act of making and passing laws
3008.translation: 立法的（与制定和通过法律的行为相关的）

3009.definition: a group of people who have the power to make and change laws
3009.translation: 立法机构（有权制定和修改法律的群体）

3010.definition: for which there is a fair and acceptable reason
3010.translation: 合法的（有公平且可接受理由的）

3011.definition: time when you are not working or studying; free time
3011.example: These days we have more money and more leisure to enjoy it.
3011.translation: 休闲，空闲（不工作或不上学的时间；自由支配的时间）

3012.definition: a yellow citrus fruit with juice that has a bitter, sharp taste. Slices of lemon and lemon juice are used in cooking and drinks.
3012.example: Add a squeeze of lemon juice.
3012.translation: 柠檬（黄色的柑橘类水果，汁液味苦且酸）

3013.definition: to give something to somebody or allow them to use something that belongs to you, which they have to return to you later
3013.example: lend something, They will lend equipment free of charge.
3013.translation: 借出（将某物给某人或允许其使用，并要求稍后归还）

3014.definition: the size or measurement of something from one end to the other
3014.example: Measure the length of the line from A to B.
3014.translation: 长度（某物从一端到另一端的尺寸或测量值）

3015.definition: very long, and often too long, in time or size
3015.translation: 冗长的（在时间或空间上非常长，且往往过长）

3016.definition: a curved piece of glass or plastic that makes things look larger, smaller or clearer when you look through it
3016.example: a pair of glasses with tinted lenses
3016.translation: 镜片，透镜（使物体看起来更大、更小或更清晰的弧形玻璃或塑料片）

3017.definition: sexually attracted to other women; connected with lesbians
3017.translation: 女同性恋的（女性对同性有性吸引力的；与女同性恋相关的）

3018.definition: to a smaller degree; not so much
3018.translation: 较少地（在较小程度上；不那么多地）

3019.definition: used with uncountable nouns to mean ‘a smaller amount of’
3019.translation: 较少的（用于不可数名词，意为“较小数量的”）

3020.definition: used with uncountable nouns to mean ‘a smaller amount of’
3020.translation: 较少（用于不可数名词，意为“较小数量的”）

3021.definition: not as great in size, amount or importance as something/somebody else
3021.translation: 次要的，较小的（在大小、数量或重要性上不如其他的人或物）

3022.definition: a period of time in which somebody is taught something
3022.translation: 课（某人被教导某事的一段时间）

3023.definition: used for making suggestions or as a polite way of telling people what you want them to do
3023.translation: 让（用于提出建议或礼貌地告诉他人你想要其做什么）

3024.definition: causing or able to cause death
3024.example: She had been given a lethal dose of poison.
3024.translation: 致命的（引起或能引起死亡的）

3025.definition: a written, typed or printed message that is put in an envelope or attached to an email and sent to somebody
3025.translation: 信，字母（放入信封寄出的文字消息；或拼写字母）

3026.definition: having a flat surface that does not slope
3026.example: Pitch the tent on level ground.
3026.translation: 平坦的（没有坡度的平整表面）

3027.definition: the height of something in relation to the ground or to what it used to be
3027.example: The cables are buried one metre below ground level.
3027.translation: 水平，高度（某物相对于地面或先前状态的高度）

3028.definition: to make something flat or smooth
3028.example: level something out, The first coat of plaster levels out the surface of the wall.
3028.translation: 使平整（使某物变得平坦或平滑）

3029.definition: legally responsible for paying the cost of something
3029.example: You will be liable for any damage caused.
3029.translation: 有责任的（在法律上负责支付某项费用的）

3030.definition: willing to understand and respect other people’s behaviour, opinions, etc., especially when they are different from your own; believing people should be able to choose how they behave
3030.translation: 开明的，自由主义的（愿意尊重他人的不同行为观点；相信人们应能自由选择）

3031.definition: a person who understands and respects other people’s opinions and behaviour, especially when they are different from their own
3031.example: He liked to think of himself as a liberal.
3031.translation: 自由主义者（尊重他人不同观点和行为的人）

3032.definition: the act or process of freeing a country or a person from the control of somebody else
3032.translation: 解放（使国家或个人脱离他人控制的行为或过程）

3033.definition: freedom to live as you choose without too many limits from government or authority
3033.example: the fight for justice and liberty
3033.translation: 自由（在没有政府或权威过度限制下按意愿生活的自由）

3034.definition: a building in which collections of books, newspapers, etc. and sometimes films and recorded music are kept for people to read, study or borrow
3034.translation: 图书馆（保存书籍、报纸、电影等供人阅读、研究或借阅的建筑）

3035.definition: an official document that shows that permission has been given to do, own or use something
3035.example: Applicants must hold a valid driving licence.
3035.translation: 执照，许可证（证明已被允许做、拥有或使用某物的官方文件）

3036.definition: to give somebody official permission to do, own, or use something
3036.example: license something, The new drug has not yet been licensed in the US.
3036.translation: 许可，授权（给予某人做、拥有或使用某物的官方许可）

3037.definition: a statement made by somebody knowing that it is not true
3037.translation: 谎言（某人在明知不真实的情况下所做的陈述）

3038.definition: to be or put yourself in a flat position so that you are not standing or sitting
3038.example: lie + adv./prep., to lie on your back/side/front
3038.translation: 躺，卧（让自己处于平卧位置，不站也不坐）

3039.definition: to say or write something that you know is not true
3039.example: You could see from his face that he was lying.
3039.translation: 撒谎（说或写你知道不真实的事情）

3040.definition: the ability to breathe, grow, produce young, etc. that people, animals and plants have before they die and that objects do not have
3040.example: This could mean the difference between life and death.
3040.translation: 生命（人、动植物在死前具有的呼吸、生长、繁殖等能力）

3041.definition: lasting or existing all through your life
3041.translation: 终身的（持续或存在于你整个生命中的）

3042.definition: the way in which a person or a group of people lives and works
3042.example: Many people are trying to adopt a healthy lifestyle these days.
3042.translation: 生活方式（个人或群体生活和工作的方式）

3043.definition: the length of time that somebody lives or that something lasts
3043.translation: 一生，寿命（某人活着或某物持续的时间长度）

3044.definition: a machine that carries people or goods up and down to different levels in a building or a mine
3044.example: It's on the sixth floor—let's take the lift.
3044.translation: 电梯（在建筑内将人或货物上下运送到不同楼层的机器）

3045.definition: to raise somebody/something or be raised to a higher position or level
3045.example: lift somebody/something, I lifted the lid of the box and peered in.
3045.translation: 举起，抬高（将某人/某物升至更高的位置或水平）

3047.definition: the energy from the sun, a lamp, etc. that makes it possible to see things
3047.translation: 光，光线（来自太阳、灯等的使看清物体成为可能的能量）

3048.definition: to make something start to burn

3049.definition: the arrangement or type of light in a place
3049.translation: 照明（地方的灯光布置或类型）

3050.example: We all have different likes and dislikes.
3050.translation: 喜欢的事物（你喜欢的东西）

3051.example: She's wearing a dress like mine.
3051.translation: 像，类似（与某人/某物相似）

3052.definition: to find somebody/something pleasant, attractive or of a good enough standard; to enjoy something
3052.example: like somebody/something, She's nice. I like her.
3052.translation: 喜欢（觉得某人/某物愉快、吸引人或达到足够标准；享受某事）

3053.definition: the chance of something happening; how likely something is to happen
3053.example: There is very little likelihood of that happening.
3053.translation: 可能性（某事发生的几率；某事发生的可能性有多大）

3054.definition: having a good chance of happening or being something; probable or expected
3054.translation: 可能的（很有机会发生或成为某样的；很可能的）

3055.definition: the same; in a similar way
3055.example: He voted for the change and he expected his colleagues to do likewise.
3055.translation: 同样地（同样地；以相似的方式）

3056.definition: an arm or a leg; a similar part of an animal, such as a wing
3056.translation: 肢（手臂或腿；或动物的翅膀等类似部分）

3057.definition: the greatest or smallest amount of something that is allowed
3057.example: They imposed a strict spending limit.
3057.translation: 限制，限额（允许的某事物的最大或最小数额）

3058.definition: to stop something from increasing beyond a particular amount or level
3058.example: measures to limit carbon dioxide emissions
3058.translation: 限制（阻止某事物超过特定数额或水平）

3059.definition: the act or process of limiting or controlling somebody/something
3059.example: They would resist any limitation of their powers.
3059.translation: 限制，局限（限制或控制某人/某物的行为或过程）

3060.definition: not very great in amount or extent
3060.example: We are doing our best with the limited resources available.
3060.translation: 有限的（在数量或范围上不大的）

3061.definition: a long, thin mark on a surface

3062.definition: to cover the inside of something with a layer of another material, especially to keep it clean or make it stronger
3062.example: Butter and line a 25 cm cake tin.
3062.translation: 内衬，衬里（在某物内部覆盖一层材料，以保持清洁或加固）

3063.definition: the people who are going to take part in a particular event
3063.translation: 阵容（参加特定活动的人员名单）

3064.example: In his art he broke the laws of scientific linear perspective.
3064.translation: 线性的（线的或成直线的）

3065.definition: to continue to exist for longer than expected
3065.example: The faint smell of her perfume lingered in the room.
3065.translation: 徘徊，逗留（存在时间比预期的长）

3066.definition: a connection between two or more people or things
3066.example: link between A and B, Police suspect there may be a link between the two murders.
3066.translation: 联系，纽带（两人或物之间的关联）

3067.definition: to make a physical or electronic connection between one object, machine, place, etc. and another
3067.example: link A to B, The video cameras are linked to a powerful computer.
3067.translation: 连接，链接（在两个物体、机器、地方等之间建立物理或电子连接）

3068.definition: a large, powerful animal of the cat family that hunts in groups and lives in parts of Africa and southern Asia. Lions have yellow-brown fur and the male has a mane (= long, thick hair round its neck).
3068.example: The lion shook its mane and roared.
3068.translation: 狮子（猫科大型强力动物，群居，生活在非洲及南亚部分地区）

3069.definition: either of the two soft edges at the opening to the mouth
3069.translation: 嘴唇（嘴开口处的两个柔软边缘之一）

3070.definition: in the form of a liquid; not a solid or a gas
3070.translation: 液体的（液态的；非固体也非气体的）

3071.definition: a substance that flows freely and is not a solid or a gas, for example water or oil
3071.example: She poured the dark brown liquid down the sink.
3071.translation: 液体（自由流动、非固体也非气体的物质，如水或油）

3072.definition: a series of names, items, figures, etc., especially when they are written or printed
3072.example: The guest list includes numerous celebrities.
3072.translation: 名单，列表（一系列书写或打印出来的名称、项目、数字等）

3073.definition: to write a list of things in a particular order
3073.example: We were asked to list our ten favourite songs.
3073.translation: 列出（按特定顺序写下项目列表）

3074.definition: to pay attention to somebody/something that you can hear
3074.example: Listen! What's that noise? Can you hear it?
3074.translation: 听（注意听你所能听到的声音或某人说话）

3075.example: a good listener (= somebody who you can rely on to listen with attention or sympathy)

3076.definition: a list, especially an official or published list of people or things, often arranged in alphabetical order
3076.example: a comprehensive listing of all airlines
3076.translation: 列表，清单（列表，尤指官方或出版的按字母顺序排列的人或物名单）

3077.definition: the ability to read and write
3077.example: a campaign to promote adult literacy
3077.translation: 识字，读写能力（阅读和书写的能力）

3078.translation: 字面上地（以字面意思地）

3080.definition: pieces of writing that are valued as works of art, especially novels, plays and poems (in contrast to technical books and newspapers, magazines, etc.)
3080.translation: 文学（被视为艺术作品的写作，尤指小说、戏剧和诗歌）

3081.definition: a unit for measuring volume, equal to 1.76 British pints or 2.11 American pints
3081.translation: 升（体积测量单位，约等于1.76英制品脱或2.11美制品脱）

3082.definition: small pieces of rubbish such as paper, cans and bottles, that people have left lying in a public place
3082.example: There will be fines for people who drop litter.
3082.translation: 垃圾（人们留在公共场所的小块废弃物，如纸张、瓶罐）

3083.definition: not big; small; smaller than others
3083.translation: 小的（不大的；小的；比其他的更小的）

3084.example: She seemed a little afraid of going inside.

3085.definition: used with uncountable nouns to mean ‘a small amount’, ‘some’
3085.translation: 一点（用于不可数名词，意为“少量”、“一些”）

3086.definition: used with uncountable nouns to mean ‘a small amount’, ‘some’
3086.translation: 一点（用于不可数名词，意为“少量”、“一些”）

3088.definition: broadcast at the time of an actual event; played or recorded at an actual performance
3088.example: The show is going out live.
3088.translation: 现场的，直播的（在事件发生时播出的；或现场表演录制的）

3089.definition: to have your home in a particular place
3089.example: to live in a house/a flat/an apartment

3090.definition: full of life and energy; active and enthusiastic
3090.example: an intelligent and lively young woman
3090.translation: 精力充沛的，活泼的（充满活力和能量的；积极且热情的）

3091.definition: a large organ in the body that cleans the blood and produces bile
3091.translation: 肝脏（人体内清理血液并产生胆汁的大器官）

3092.translation: 活着的（现存的；所有的生物）

3093.definition: money to buy the things that you need in life
3093.example: She earns her living as a freelance journalist.
3093.translation: 生计（维持生活所需的金钱）

3094.definition: something that is being carried (usually in large amounts) by a person, vehicle, etc.
3094.example: The trucks waited at the warehouse to pick up their loads.
3094.translation: 负载，装载物（由人、车等携带的物体，通常数量很大）

3095.definition: to put a large quantity of things or people onto or into something
3095.example: load something, We loaded the car in ten minutes.
3095.translation: 装载（将大量物或人放入或放在某物上）

3096.definition: money that an organization such as a bank lends and somebody borrows
3096.example: to take out/repay a loan (= to borrow money/pay it back)
3096.translation: 贷款（由银行等机构借出、某人借入的钱）

3097.definition: a large area inside the entrance of a public building where people can meet and wait
3097.translation: 大厅，大堂（公共建筑入口内供人们见面和等待的大区域）

3098.definition: to try to influence a politician or the government and, for example, persuade them to support or oppose a change in the law
3098.example: Farmers will lobby Congress for higher subsidies.
3098.translation: 游说（试图影响政治家或政府，例如说服其支持或反对法律修改）

3099.definition: belonging to or connected with the particular place or area that you are talking about or with the place where you live
3099.translation: 当地的（属于或与你谈论的特定地方或你居住的区域相关的）

3100.definition: a person who lives in a particular place or district
3100.translation: 当地人（居住在特定地方或区域的人）

3101.definition: to find the exact position of somebody/something
3101.example: The mechanic located the fault immediately.
3101.translation: 定位（找出某人/某物的确切位置）

3102.definition: if something is located in a particular place, it exists there or has been put there
3102.example: a small town located 30 miles south of Chicago
3102.translation: 位于（如果某物位于某处，指其存在于那里或被安置在那里）

3103.definition: a place where something happens or exists; the position of something
3103.example: a honeymoon in a secret location
3103.translation: 地点，位置（某事发生或存在的地方；某物的位置）

3104.definition: a device that keeps a door, window, box, etc. shut, usually needing a key to open it
3104.example: She turned the key in the lock.
3104.translation: 锁（通常需要钥匙开启的固定门、窗、盒子等的装置）

3105.definition: to fasten something with a lock; to be fastened with a lock
3105.translation: 上锁（用锁固定某物；被锁住）

3106.definition: a thick piece of wood that is cut from or has fallen from a tree
3106.translation: 原木（从树上砍下或落下的粗木块）

3107.definition: to put information in an official record or write a record of events
3107.example: The police log all phone calls.
3107.translation: 记录（在官方记录中输入信息或记录事件）

3108.definition: a way of thinking or explaining something
3108.example: I fail to see the logic behind his argument.
3108.translation: 逻辑（思考或解释某事的方式）

3109.example: It was a logical conclusion from the child's point of view.
3109.translation: 合乎逻辑的（显得自然、合理或明智的）

3110.definition: a printed design or symbol that a company or an organization uses as its special sign
3110.example: All over the world there are red and white paper cups bearing the company logo.
3110.translation: 标志，徽标（公司或组织用作其特别标志的打印图案或符号）

3111.definition: unhappy because you have no friends or people to talk to
3111.example: She lives alone and often feels lonely.
3111.translation: 孤独的（因没有朋友或交流的人而感到不快乐的）

3112.definition: measuring or covering a great length or distance, or a greater length or distance than usual
3112.translation: 长的（在长度或距离上很大的，或超过通常水平的）

3113.translation: 长时间地（在很长一段时间内）

3114.definition: that has existed or lasted for a long time
3114.translation: 长期的（已经存在或持续了很长时间的）

3115.definition: lasting or having an effect over a long period of time
3115.example: Our long-term goal is to lower operating costs by 10 per cent.
3115.translation: 长期的（在长时期内持续或产生影响的）

3116.definition: over a long period of time

3117.definition: having been the particular thing mentioned for a long time
3117.translation: 长期的（在很长时间内一直是提到的那种身份的）

3118.definition: an act of looking at somebody/something
3118.example: look at somebody/something, Here, have a look at this.

3119.definition: to turn your eyes in a particular direction
3119.example: Look closely and tell me what you see.
3119.translation: 看（将眼睛转向特定方向）

3120.definition: to appear as a large shape that is not clear, especially in a frightening way
3120.example: A dark shape loomed up ahead of us.
3120.translation: 隐约显现（以模糊且庞大的形状出现，尤指令人恐惧地）

3121.definition: a shape like a curve or circle made by a line curving right round
3121.example: The road went in a huge loop around the lake.
3121.translation: 环，圈（由线条绕圈形成的弧线或圆形形状）

3122.definition: not securely fixed where it should be; able to become separated from something
3122.translation: 松的（未牢固固定的；能从某物上脱落的）

3123.definition: (in the UK) a man of high rank in the nobility (= people of high social class), or somebody who has been given the title ‘lord’ as an honour
3123.translation: 勋爵，大人（英国高等级贵族，或作为荣誉给予的头衔）

3124.definition: a large vehicle for carrying heavy loads by road
3124.translation: 卡车，货车（用于通过公路运输重型货物的大型车辆）

3125.definition: to be unable to find something/somebody
3125.translation: 丢失（无法找到某物/某人）

3126.definition: the state of no longer having something or as much of something; the process that leads to this
3126.example: I want to report the loss of a package.
3126.translation: 丢失，损失（不再拥有某物或拥有量减少的状态；导致此结果的过程）

3127.definition: unable to find your way; not knowing where you are
3127.example: We always get lost in London.
3127.translation: 迷路的（无法找到路；不知道自己在何处的）

3128.definition: used with verbs to mean ‘a great amount’
3128.example: I care a lot about you.
3128.translation: 很多地（与动词连用，意为“大量地”）

3129.definition: a large number or amount of somebody/something
3129.translation: 许多（某人/某物的很大数量或金额）

3130.translation: 很多（很大的数量或金额）

3131.definition: a way of raising money for a government, charity, etc. by selling tickets that have different numbers on them that people have chosen. Numbers are then chosen by chance and the people who have those numbers on their tickets win prizes.
3131.translation: 彩票（通过出售带有不同号码的彩票为政府、慈善机构筹款的方式）

3132.translation: 大声的（发出很大响声的）

3133.definition: in a way that makes a lot of noise or can be easily heard
3133.example: Do you have to play that music so loud?
3133.translation: 大声地（以很大响声或易被听见的方式）

3134.definition: in a way that makes a lot of noise
3134.example: She screamed as loudly as she could.
3134.translation: 大声地（以产生很大响声的方式）

3135.definition: a very strong feeling of liking and caring for somebody/something, especially a member of your family or a friend
3135.example: She has earned the love and respect of many people.
3135.translation: 爱，热爱（对某人/某物——尤指家人或朋友——极强烈的喜爱和关怀感）

3136.definition: to have very strong feelings of liking and caring for somebody
3136.translation: 爱（对某人有极强烈的喜爱和关怀感）

3137.example: She looked particularly lovely that night.
3137.translation: 可爱的，美丽的（美丽的；迷人的）

3138.definition: not high or tall; not far above the ground
3138.translation: 低的（不高的；离地面不远的）

3139.definition: in or into a low position, not far above the ground
3139.translation: 低低地（处于离地面不远的位置）

3140.definition: a low level or point; a low figure
3140.example: The temperature reached a record low in London last night.
3140.translation: 低点（低水平或低点；低数字）

3141.definition: to reduce something or to become less in value, quality, etc.
3141.example: lower something, He lowered his voice to a whisper.
3141.translation: 降低（减少某物或使其价值、质量下降）

3142.definition: remaining constant in your support of somebody/something
3142.translation: 忠诚的（对自己支持的人或物保持恒定支持的）

3143.definition: the quality of being constant in your support of somebody/something
3143.example: Can I count on your loyalty?
3143.translation: 忠诚（对自己支持的人或物保持恒定支持的品质）

3144.definition: good things that happen to you by chance, not because of your own efforts or abilities
3144.example: with (any) luck, With any luck, we'll be home before dark.
3144.translation: 运气（偶然发生的而非因努力产生的好事）

3145.example: lucky to do something, His friend was killed and he knows he is lucky to be alive.

3146.definition: a meal eaten in the middle of the day
3146.translation: 午餐（在一日午间吃的饭）

3147.definition: either of the two organs in the chest that you use for breathing
3147.example: Her father died of lung cancer.
3147.translation: 肺（胸腔内用于呼吸的两个器官之一）

3148.definition: expensive and of very high quality
3148.translation: 豪华的，奢侈的（昂贵且高质量的）

3149.definition: the fact of enjoying special and expensive things, particularly food and drink, clothes and places
3149.translation: 奢侈，奢华（享受特殊且昂贵事物的实情，尤指食宿、衣物）

3150.definition: the words of a popular song
3150.example: music and lyrics by Rodgers and Hart

3151.definition: a piece of equipment with many parts that work together to do a particular task. The power used to work a machine may be electricity, steam, gas, etc. or human power.
3151.example: Machines have replaced human labour in many industries.
3151.translation: 机器（由许多部件协作完成特定任务的设备，动力可来自电、蒸汽等）

3152.definition: machines as a group, especially large ones
3152.translation: 机械（作为一个整体的机器，尤指大型机器）

3153.definition: very stupid; not at all sensible
3153.example: You must be mad to risk it.
3153.translation: 疯的，愚蠢的（非常愚蠢的；一点不明智的）

3154.definition: a type of large thin book with a paper cover that you can buy every week or month, containing articles, photographs, etc., often on a particular topic; a similar collection of articles, etc. that appears regularly online
3154.translation: 杂志（每周或每月出版的、包含文章照片的薄册子；或在线合集）

3155.definition: having or using special powers to make impossible things happen or seem to happen
3155.translation: 有魔力的（具有或使用特殊力量使不可能之事发生或看似发生的）

3156.definition: the secret power of appearing to make impossible things happen by saying special words or doing special things
3156.translation: 魔法（通过说特殊词语或做特殊动作使不可能之事发生的神秘力量）

3157.translation: 魔幻的（包含魔法的；用于魔法的）

3158.definition: an official who acts as a judge in the lowest courts of law
3158.example: to come up before the magistrates
3158.translation: 地方法官（在初级法院担任法官的官员）

3159.definition: behaving like a magnet; that can be attracted by a magnet
3159.translation: 有磁性的（表现得像磁铁的；能被磁铁吸引的）

3160.definition: extremely attractive and impressive; deserving praise
3160.example: The Taj Mahal is a magnificent building.
3160.translation: 壮丽的，宏伟的（极具吸引力和感染力的；值得赞美的）

3161.definition: the great size or importance of something; the degree to which something is large or important
3161.example: We did not realize the magnitude of the problem.
3161.translation: 巨大，规模（事物巨大的规模或重要性；事物的巨大程度）

3162.definition: the official system used for sending and delivering letters, packages, etc.
3162.translation: 邮件（用于寄送和递送信件、包裹的官方系统）

3163.definition: to send something to somebody using the postal system
3163.example: mail something (to somebody/something), Don't forget to mail that letter to your mother.
3163.translation: 邮寄（利用邮政系统给某人寄送某物）

3164.definition: being the largest or most important of its kind
3164.example: Be careful crossing the main road.
3164.translation: 主要的（同类中最大或最重要的）

3165.definition: the main area of land of a country or region, not including any islands near to it
3165.example: to/from the mainland, a boat to/from the mainland
3165.translation: 大陆（国家或地区的主要陆地区域，不包括附近岛屿）

3166.definition: more than anything else; also used to talk about the most important reason for something
3166.example: They eat mainly fruit and nuts.
3166.translation: 主要地（比其他任何事物都多；也用于说明最重要的原因）

3167.definition: considered normal because it reflects what is done or accepted by most people
3167.translation: 主流的（被大多数人接受或视为正常的）

3168.definition: the ideas and opinions that are thought to be normal because they are shared by most people; the people whose ideas and opinions are most accepted
3168.example: His radical views place him outside the mainstream of American politics.
3168.translation: 主流（被视为正常的思想观点，因其被大多数人认同）

3169.definition: to make something continue at the same level, standard, etc.
3169.example: to maintain law and order/standards/a balance/control
3169.translation: 维持，保持（使某事保持在同一水平、标准等）

3170.definition: the act of keeping something in good condition by checking or repairing it regularly
3170.example: The school pays for heating and the maintenance of the buildings.
3170.translation: 维护，保养（通过定期检查或修理使某物保持良好状态的行为）

3171.translation: 主要的，重大的（非常大或重要的）

3172.definition: the largest part of a group of people or things
3172.example: majority (of somebody/something), The majority of people interviewed prefer TV to radio.
3172.translation: 多数（一群人或事物中的大部分）

3173.definition: the name or type of a machine, piece of equipment, etc. that is made by a particular company
3173.example: make of something, What make of car does he drive?
3173.translation: 品牌，型号（由特定公司制造的机器、设备的名称或类型）

3174.definition: to create or prepare something by combining materials or putting parts together
3174.example: make something, to make a table/dress/cake
3174.translation: 制造，做（通过组合材料或部件创造或准备某物）

3175.definition: coloured substances used on the skin to make yourself look more attractive or to change your appearance
3175.translation: 化妆品（用于皮肤上以增加吸引力或改变外观的彩色物质）

3176.definition: the act or process of making or producing something
3176.translation: 制造（制造或生产某物的行为或过程）

3178.definition: a male person, animal or plant
3178.example: The male of the species has a white tail.
3178.translation: 雄性（男性的人、动物或植物）

3179.definition: a large building or covered area that has many shops, restaurants, etc. inside it
3179.translation: 购物中心（包含许多商店、餐厅的大型建筑或覆盖区域）

3181.definition: to control or be in charge of a business, a team, an organization, land, etc.
3181.translation: 管理（控制或负责业务、团队、组织、土地等）

3182.definition: the activity of running and controlling a business or similar organization
3182.translation: 管理（运行和控制业务或类似组织的活动）

3183.definition: a person who is in charge of running a business, a shop or a similar organization or part of one
3183.translation: 经理（负责运行业务、商店、组织或其一部分的人）

3184.definition: the authority to do something, given to a government or other organization by the people who vote for it in an election
3184.example: It is undemocratic to govern an area without an electoral mandate.
3184.translation: 授权（由选民在选举中给予政府或组织的权力）

3185.example: The offence carries a mandatory life sentence.

3186.definition: to show something clearly, especially a feeling, an attitude or a quality
3186.example: Social tensions were manifested in the recent political crisis.
3186.translation: 表现，显示（清晰地展示某事，尤指情感、态度或品质）

3187.definition: to control or influence somebody/something, often in a dishonest way so that they do not realize it
3187.example: manipulate somebody/something, She uses her charm to manipulate people.
3187.translation: 操控，操纵（控制或影响某人/某物，常以不诚实的方式使其不察觉）

3188.definition: behaviour that controls or influences somebody/something, often in a dishonest way so that they do not realize it
3188.example: Advertising like this is a cynical manipulation of the elderly.
3188.translation: 操控，操纵（控制或影响某人/某物的行为，常以不诚实的方式）

3189.definition: behaviour that is considered to be polite in a particular society or culture
3189.translation: 举止，礼貌（在特定社会或文化中被视为礼貌的行为）

3190.definition: to make goods in large quantities, using machines
3190.translation: 制造（利用机器大规模生产商品）

3191.definition: the business or industry of producing goods in large quantities in factories, etc.
3191.example: Many jobs in manufacturing were lost during the recession.
3191.translation: 制造业（在工厂大规模生产商品的业务或行业）

3192.definition: a copy of a book, piece of music, etc. before it has been printed
3192.translation: 手稿（书、音乐等在印刷前的副本）

3193.definition: used with plural nouns and verbs, especially in negative sentences or in more formal English, to mean ‘a large number of’. Also used in questions to ask about the size of a number, and with ‘as’, ‘so’ and ‘too’.
3193.example: We don't have very many copies left.
3193.translation: 许多（用于复数名词，表示“大量”。也用于疑问句询及数量）

3194.definition: used with plural nouns and verbs, especially in negative sentences or in more formal English, to mean ‘a large number of’. Also used in questions to ask about the size of a number, and with ‘as’, ‘so’ and ‘too’.
3194.example: We don't have very many copies left.
3194.translation: 许多（用于复数名词，表示“大量”。也用于疑问句询及数量）

3195.definition: a drawing or plan of the earth’s surface or part of it, showing countries, towns, rivers, etc.
3195.translation: 地图（地球表面或其一部分的绘图，显示国家、城镇、河流等）

3196.definition: to make a map of an area
3196.example: an unexplored region that has not yet been mapped
3196.translation: 绘图（制作某一区域的地图）

3197.definition: a long running race of about 42 kilometres or 26 miles
3197.translation: 马拉松（约42公里或26英里的长跑比赛）

3198.definition: the 3rd month of the year, between February and April
3198.translation: 三月（一年中的第三个月）

3199.definition: an organized walk by many people from one place to another, in order to protest about something, or to express their opinions
3199.translation: 游行（许多人为了抗议或表达观点而进行的有组织的行走）

3200.definition: to walk with stiff regular steps like a soldier
3200.example: Quick march! (= the order to start marching)
3200.translation: 齐步走（像士兵一样步伐整齐地行走）

3201.definition: the empty space at the side of a written or printed page
3201.translation: 页边空白（书写或打印页面侧边的空白处）

3202.example: a marginal improvement in weather conditions
3202.translation: 微小的，边缘的（微小且不重要的）

3203.definition: connected with the sea and the creatures and plants that live there
3203.translation: 海洋的（与海洋及其中生物、植物相关的）

3204.definition: a written or printed symbol that is used as a sign of something, for example the quality of something or who made or owns it
3204.translation: 标记，符号（用作某种迹象的书写或打印符号，如品质标志）

3205.definition: to write or draw a symbol, line, etc. on something in order to give information about it
3205.example: mark something, The flood level is marked by a white line on the wall.
3205.translation: 标记（在某物上写或画符号、线条以给出信息）

3206.definition: an object or a sign that shows the position of something
3206.translation: 标记物（显示位置的物体或标志）

3207.definition: an occasion when people buy and sell goods; the open area or building where they meet to do this
3207.translation: 市场（人们买卖商品的场合；或进行买卖的空地、建筑）

3208.definition: to advertise a product in a particular way in order to make people want it
3208.example: market something, The company utilizes every media tool available to market its products.
3208.translation: 营销，推销（以特定方式为产品做广告以吸引购买）

3209.definition: the activity of presenting, advertising and selling a company’s products or services in the best possible way
3209.translation: 营销（以最佳方式呈现、宣传和销售公司产品或服务的活动）

3210.definition: the activity of competing with other companies to buy and sell goods, services, etc.
3210.example: Companies must be able to survive in the marketplace.
3210.translation: 市场（与其他公司竞争买卖商品、服务的活动）

3211.definition: the legal relationship between two people who are married to each other
3211.translation: 婚姻（两人间合法的结合关系）

3212.translation: 已婚的（有丈夫或妻子的）

3213.definition: to become the husband or wife of somebody; to get married to somebody
3213.translation: 结婚（成为某人的丈夫或妻子）

3215.definition: something that you wear over your face to hide it, or to frighten or entertain other people
3215.translation: 面具，口罩（戴在脸上以隐藏、吓人或娱乐的东西）

3216.definition: affecting or involving a large number of people or things
3216.example: The world faces the tremendous problem of mass unemployment.
3216.translation: 大规模的（影响或涉及大量人员或事物的）

3217.definition: a large amount of a substance that does not have a definite shape or form
3217.example: She saw a large dark mass in the water.
3217.translation: 块，团（没有固定形状的大量物质）

3218.definition: the killing of a large number of people especially in a cruel way
3218.example: the bloody massacre of innocent civilians
3218.translation: 大屠杀（尤指以残忍方式杀害大量的人）

3219.translation: 巨大的（非常大、重且坚固的）

3220.definition: a man who has people working for him, often as servants in his home
3220.example: They lived in fear of their master.
3220.translation: 主人（雇佣他人——常作为家仆——的人）

3221.definition: to learn or understand something completely
3221.example: She never completely mastered the art of lip-reading.
3221.translation: 精通，掌握（完全学会或理解某事）

3222.definition: a sports event where people or teams compete against each other
3222.translation: 比赛（人们或团队互相竞争的体育赛事）

3223.definition: to find somebody/something that goes together with or is connected with another person or thing
3223.example: match A and B, Match the words and pictures.
3223.translation: 匹配（找出与另一人/物相配或相连的人/物）

3224.definition: having the same colour, pattern, style, etc. and therefore looking attractive together
3224.example: The two sisters wore matching outfits.
3224.translation: 匹配的（颜色、图案、风格相同因而搭配美观的）

3225.example: They've been best mates since school.

3226.definition: to have sex in order to produce young
3226.example: Do foxes ever mate with dogs?
3226.translation: 交配（进行性行为以产生后代）

3227.definition: connected with money, possessions, etc. rather than with the needs of the mind or spirit
3227.translation: 物质的（与金钱、财产而非精神需求相关的）

3228.definition: a substance that things can be made from
3228.example: building materials (= bricks, sand, glass, etc.)
3228.translation: 材料，物质（可以用来制造东西的物质，如建筑材料）

3229.translation: 数学的（与数学相关或涉及数学的）

3230.definition: the science of numbers and shapes. Branches of mathematics include arithmetic, algebra, geometry and trigonometry.
3230.translation: 数学（关于数字和形状的科学）

3231.definition: mathematics, especially as a subject in school
3231.example: The core subjects are English, maths and science.
3231.translation: 数学（数学，尤指作为学校科目）

3232.definition: used (to ask) if somebody is upset, unhappy, etc. or if there is a problem
3232.example: What's the matter? Is there something wrong?
3232.translation: 事情，问题（用于询问是否有人不快或是否有问题）

3233.definition: to be important or have an important effect on somebody/something
3233.example: ‘I'm afraid I forgot that book again.’ ‘It doesn't matter (= it is not important enough to worry about).’
3233.translation: 要紧，有关系（重要或对某人/某事有重要影响）

3234.definition: behaving in a sensible way, like an adult
3234.example: Jane is very mature for her age.
3234.translation: 成熟的（举止明智，像成年人一样的）

3235.definition: to become fully grown or developed
3235.example: This particular breed of cattle matures early.

3236.definition: to increase something as much as possible
3236.translation: 最大化（尽可能地增加某物）

3237.definition: as large, fast, etc. as is possible, or the most that is possible or allowed
3237.translation: 最大的（尽可能大的、快的，或允许的最大数额）

3238.definition: the greatest amount, size, speed, etc. that is possible, recorded or allowed
3238.example: a maximum of 30 children in a class
3238.translation: 最大值（可能的、记录的或允许的最大数量、规模或速度）

3239.definition: the fifth month of the year, between April and June
3239.translation: 五月（一年中的第五个月）

3240.definition: used to say that something is possible
3240.example: That may or may not be true.
3240.translation: 可能（用于表示某事是可能的）

3241.definition: used when you are not certain that something will happen or that something is true or is a correct number
3241.example: Maybe he'll come, maybe he won't.
3241.translation: 也许（用于对某事是否发生或是否属实不确定时）

3242.definition: the head of the government of a town or city, etc., elected by the public
3242.translation: 市长（由公众选出的城镇或城市政府的首脑）

3243.definition: the form of I that is used when the speaker or writer is the object of a verb or preposition, or after the verb be

3244.definition: an occasion when people eat food, especially breakfast, lunch or dinner
3244.example: Try not to eat between meals.
3244.translation: 餐（进食的场合，如早、中、晚餐）

3245.definition: to have something as a meaning in the same or another language
3245.example: mean something, What does this sentence mean?
3245.translation: 意思是（在同种或另一种语言中具有某种含义）

3246.definition: the thing or idea that a sound, word, sign, etc. represents
3246.example: What's the meaning of this word?
3246.translation: 意思，含义（声音、词语、符号所代表的事物或想法）

3247.translation: 有意义的（严肃且重要的）

3248.definition: an action, an object or a system by which a result is achieved; a way of achieving or doing something
3248.example: means of something, Email is a highly effective means of communication.
3248.translation: 手段，方法（实现结果的行动、物体或系统）

3249.definition: for a short period of time but not permanently
3249.example: I'm changing my email address but for the meantime you can use the old one.
3249.translation: 其间（一段短时间内，非永久地）

3250.example: Leave the cake to cool completely. Meanwhile, make the topping.
3250.translation: 同时（当另一件事正在发生时）

3251.definition: an official action that is done in order to achieve a particular aim
3251.translation: 措施（为了实现特定目标而采取的正式行动）

3252.definition: to find the size, quantity, etc. of something in standard units
3252.example: measure something/somebody, a device that measures the level of radiation in the atmosphere
3252.translation: 测量（以标准单位找出某物的尺寸、数量等）

3253.definition: the act or the process of finding the size, quantity or degree of something
3253.translation: 测量（找出尺寸、数量或程度的行为或过程）

3254.definition: the soft part of an animal or a bird that can be eaten as food; a particular type of this
3254.translation: 肉（动物或鸟类可食用的柔软部分）

3255.definition: a person whose job is repairing machines, especially the engines of vehicles
3255.translation: 技工，机修工（职业是修理机器——尤指车辆引擎——的人）

3256.definition: operated by power from an engine
3256.translation: 机械的（由引擎动力驱动的）

3257.definition: a set of moving parts in a machine that performs a task
3257.translation: 机制（机器中执行任务的一套运动部件）

3258.definition: a flat piece of metal, usually like a coin in shape, that is given to the winner of a competition or to somebody who has been brave, for example in war
3258.example: to win a gold medal in the Olympics
3258.translation: 奖牌（授予比赛获胜者或勇敢者的扁平金属片）

3259.definition: the main ways that large numbers of people receive information and entertainment, that is television, radio, newspapers and the internet
3259.translation: 媒体（大量人群接收信息和娱乐的主要方式，如电视、网络等）

3260.definition: connected with illness and injury and their treatment
3260.translation: 医学的，医疗的（与疾病、损伤及其治疗相关的）

3261.definition: a drug or another form of medicine that you take to prevent or to treat an illness; treatment involving drugs
3261.example: Are you currently taking any medication?
3261.translation: 药物（预防或治疗疾病而服用的药物；药物治疗）

3262.definition: the study and treatment of diseases and injuries
3262.translation: 医学，药物（疾病和损伤的研究与治疗）

3263.definition: connected with the Middle Ages (about AD 1000 to AD 1450)
3263.translation: 中世纪的（与中世纪相关的，约公元1000-1450年）

3264.definition: the practice of focusing your mind in silence, especially for religious reasons or in order to make your mind calm
3264.example: She found peace through yoga and meditation.
3264.translation: 冥想（静心专注的练习，尤指出于宗教或寻求平静的目的）

3265.definition: in the middle between a larger and smaller size, amount, length, temperature, etc.
3265.example: There are three sizes—small, medium and large.
3265.translation: 中等的（处于大尺寸与小尺寸、高低温等中间的）

3266.definition: a way of communicating information, etc. to people
3266.translation: 媒介（向人们交流信息等的方式）

3267.definition: to be in the same place as somebody by chance and talk to them
3267.example: Maybe we'll meet again some time.
3267.translation: 遇见（偶然与某人在同一地点相遇并交谈）

3268.definition: an occasion when people come together to discuss or decide something
3268.example: A hundred people attended the public meeting.
3268.translation: 会议（人们聚集在一起讨论或决定的场合）

3269.definition: a tune, especially the main tune in a piece of music written for several instruments or voices
3269.translation: 旋律（曲调，尤指为多种乐器/人声编写的音乐中的主旋律）

3270.definition: to become or make something become liquid as a result of heating
3270.example: The snow showed no sign of melting.
3270.translation: 融化（因受热而变成液体或使某物变成液体）

3271.definition: a person, an animal or a plant that belongs to a particular group
3271.example: member of something, a member of the family/community
3271.translation: 成员（属于特定群体的个人、动物或植物）

3272.definition: the state of being a member of a group, a club, an organization, etc.
3272.example: membership of something, (British English), Who is eligible to apply for membership of the association?
3272.translation: 会员身份（作为群体、俱乐部或组织一员的状态）

3273.definition: an official note from one person to another in the same organization
3273.translation: 备忘录（组织内部人员间的正式便条）

3274.definition: an account written by somebody, especially somebody famous, about their life and experiences
3274.translation: 回忆录（由某人——尤指名人——撰写的关于其生活和经历的记录）

3275.definition: worth remembering or easy to remember, especially because of being special or unusual
3275.example: The holiday provided many memorable moments.
3275.translation: 值得纪念的（值得记住或易于记住的，尤指因特别或不寻常）

3276.definition: a statue, stone, etc. that is built in order to remind people of an important past event or of a famous person who has died
3276.example: a war memorial (= in memory of soldiers who died in a war)
3276.translation: 纪念碑/碑（为了提醒人们记住过去重要事件或逝去名人而建的雕像、石碑）

3277.example: memory for something, I have a bad memory for names.

3278.definition: connected with or happening in the mind; involving the process of thinking
3278.translation: 精神的，心理的（与大脑相关或在脑中发生的；涉及思考过程的）

3279.definition: an act of referring to somebody/something in speech or writing
3279.example: He made no mention of her work.
3279.translation: 提及（在言谈或书写中引用某人/某事）

3280.definition: to write or speak about something/somebody, especially without giving much information
3280.example: mention something/somebody, Sorry, I won't mention it again.
3280.translation: 提及（谈论或写到某人/某事，尤指未给太多信息时）

3281.definition: an experienced person who advises and helps somebody with less experience over a period of time
3281.example: She was a friend and mentor to many young actors.
3281.translation: 导师，导师（在一段时间内为经验不足者提供建议和帮助的有经验的人）

3282.definition: a list of the food that is available at a restaurant or to be served at a meal
3282.translation: 菜单（餐厅提供的食物清单或餐点列表）

3283.definition: a person who buys and sells goods in large quantities, especially one who imports and exports goods
3283.translation: 商人（大量买卖商品的人，尤指从事进出口贸易的人）

3284.definition: a kind or forgiving attitude towards somebody that you have the power to harm or right to punish
3284.translation: 仁慈，怜悯（对你有权伤害或惩罚的人表现出的和蔼或宽恕态度）

3285.definition: used when you want to emphasize how small, unimportant, etc. somebody/something is
3285.example: It took her a mere 20 minutes to win.
3285.translation: 仅仅的（用于强调某人/某物是多么微小或不重要）

3286.definition: used meaning ‘only’ or ‘simply’ to emphasize a fact or something that you are saying
3286.example: It is not merely a job, but a way of life.
3286.translation: 仅仅，只（用于强调事实或所言，意为“仅仅”或“简单地”）

3287.definition: to combine or make two or more things combine to form a single thing
3287.example: The banks are set to merge next year.
3287.translation: 合并（结合或使两个或更多事物结合形成单一事物）

3288.definition: the act of joining two or more organizations or businesses into one
3288.example: If the merger goes through, thousands of jobs will be lost.
3288.translation: 合并（将两个或更多组织、业务加入为一个的行为）

3289.definition: the quality of being good and of deserving praise or reward
3289.example: a work of outstanding artistic merit
3289.translation: 优点，功绩（优秀且值得称赞或奖赏的品质）

3290.example: in a mess, The room was in a mess.
3290.translation: 混乱（肮脏或杂乱的状态）

3291.definition: a written or spoken piece of information, etc. that you send to somebody or leave for somebody when you cannot speak to them yourself
3291.example: There were no messages for me at the hotel.
3291.translation: 消息（当你无法亲自交谈时发送或留给某人的书面或口头信息）

3292.definition: a type of solid mineral substance that is usually hard and shiny and that heat and electricity can travel through, for example tin, iron and gold
3292.translation: 金属（通常坚硬发光且能导热导电的固体矿物质，如铁、金）

3293.definition: a word or phrase used to describe somebody/something else, in a way that is different from its normal use, in order to show that the two things have the same qualities and to make the description more powerful, for example She has a heart of stone; the use of such words and phrases
3293.example: a game of football used as a metaphor for the competitive struggle of life
3293.translation: 隐喻（用与通常用法不同的词语描述某物以展示其具有相同品质）

3294.definition: a particular way of doing something
3294.example: Which method is the most effective?
3294.translation: 方法（做某事的特定方式）

3295.definition: a set of methods and principles used to perform a particular activity
3295.example: recent changes in the methodology of language teaching
3295.translation: 方法论（用于执行特定活动的一套方法和原则）

3296.definition: a unit for measuring length; a hundred centimetres

3297.definition: in a position in the middle of an object, group of objects, people, etc.; between the beginning and the end of something
3297.example: Pens are kept in the middle drawer.
3297.translation: 中间的（处于物体、群体等的中间位置；介于开端和结尾之间）

3298.definition: the part of something that is at an equal distance from all its edges or sides; a point or a period of time between the beginning and the end of something
3298.example: in the middle, a lake with an island in the middle
3298.translation: 中间（某物与所有边缘或侧面距离相等的部分；一段时间的中间点）

3299.example: She heard the clock strike midnight.

3300.example: in the midst of something, Such beauty was unexpected in the midst of the city.
3300.translation: 中间，当中（某事物的中间部分）

3301.definition: used when showing that something is or was possible
3301.example: He might get there in time, but I can't be sure.
3301.translation: 可能（用于表示某事是可能的）

3302.definition: the movement every year of large numbers of birds or animals from one place to another
3302.example: the seasonal migration of blue whales
3302.translation: 迁徙，移居（大批鸟类或动物每年进行的季节性移动）

3303.example: a mild form of the disease
3303.translation: 温和的（不严重的或不强烈的，如轻微的疾病）

3304.definition: a unit for measuring distance equal to 1 609 metres or 1 760 yards
3304.translation: 英里（长度单位，约等于1609米）

3305.definition: using, or willing to use, force or strong pressure to achieve your aims, especially to achieve social or political change
3305.translation: 激进的（为了达到目的——尤指社会或政治变革——而使用武力或强压的）

3306.definition: a person who uses, or is willing to use, force or strong pressure to achieve their aims, especially to achieve social or political change
3306.example: Student militants were fighting with the police.
3306.translation: 激进分子（使用武力或强压以达到社会或政治变革目的的人）

3307.definition: connected with soldiers or the armed forces
3307.example: We may have to take military action.
3307.translation: 军事的（与士兵或武装部队相关的）

3308.example: The military was/were called in to deal with the riot.
3308.translation: 军队（士兵；武装部队的总称）

3309.definition: a group of people who are not professional soldiers but who have had military training and can act as an army
3309.example: He said he would call out the state militia if the rebels did not surrender.
3309.translation: 民兵组织（非职业士兵但受过军事训练、可作为军队行动的团体）

3310.definition: the white liquid produced by cows, goats and some other animals as food for their young and used as a drink by humans
3310.translation: 牛奶（牛、山羊等产出的白色液体，供幼崽食用及人类饮用）

3311.definition: a building fitted with equipment for grinding grain into flour; a machine for grinding grain
3311.example: The old mill has been converted into apartments.
3311.translation: 磨坊，磨粉机（装有将谷物磨成粉的设备的建筑或机器）

3312.example: a population of half a million

3313.definition: the part of a person that makes them able to be aware of things, to think and to feel
3313.translation: 头脑，心思（人能够感知、思考和感觉的部分，如意识或潜意识）

3314.definition: to be upset, annoyed or worried by something
3314.example: mind (something), I don't mind the cold—it's the rain I don't like.
3314.translation: 介意（因某事感到不快、恼火或担心）

3315.definition: a deep hole or holes under the ground where minerals such as coal, gold, etc. are dug
3315.translation: 矿山，矿井（地下的深洞，用于挖掘煤、金等矿物）

3316.definition: of or belonging to the person writing or speaking
3316.translation: 我的（属于说话者或作者的东西）

3317.definition: a person who works in a mine taking out coal, gold, diamonds, etc.
3317.example: Rescuers are trying to save miners trapped underground after a gas explosion.
3317.translation: 矿工（在矿井中从事挖掘煤、金、钻石等工作的人）

3318.definition: a substance that is naturally present in the earth and is not formed from animal or vegetable matter, for example gold and salt. Some minerals are also present in food and drink and in the human body and are essential for good health.
3318.example: a country rich in mineral resources
3318.translation: 矿物质，矿物（地壳中自然存在的非生物物质，如金、盐；也指食物中的矿物质）

3319.definition: very small in size or amount; as small as possible
3319.example: The work was carried out at minimal cost.
3319.translation: 最小的，极小的（在尺寸或数量上非常小的；尽可能小的）

3320.definition: to reduce something, especially something bad, to the lowest possible level
3320.example: Good hygiene helps to minimize the risk of infection.
3320.translation: 使最小化（将某事——尤指坏事——减少到最低水平）

3321.definition: the smallest that is possible or allowed; extremely small
3321.translation: 最小的，最低限度的（尽可能小的或允许的最低限度）

3322.definition: the smallest or lowest amount that is possible, required or recorded
3322.example: The class needs a minimum of six students to continue.
3322.translation: 最小值（可能的、要求的或记录的最小数量或数额）

3323.definition: the process of getting coal and other minerals from under the ground; the industry involved in this
3323.translation: 采矿，采矿业（从地下获取煤和其他矿物的过程或行业）

3324.definition: a senior member of the government who is in charge of a government department or a branch of one
3324.translation: 部长，大臣（政府部门的高级负责人）

3325.definition: a government department that has a particular area of responsibility
3325.example: The Ministry of Defence has issued the following statement.
3325.translation: 部，部委（具有特定职责范围的政府部门）

3326.definition: not very large, important or serious
3326.example: The new plan involves widening a minor road through the valley.
3326.translation: 次要的，较小的（不很大、不重要或不严重的）

3327.definition: the smaller part of a group; less than half of the people or things in a large group
3327.example: Only a small minority of students is/are interested in politics these days.
3327.translation: 少数，少数民族（群体中较小的部分；不足总数的一半）

3328.example: minute amounts of chemicals in the water
3328.translation: 极小的（极其微小的，如水中微量的化学物质）

3329.definition: each of the 60 parts of an hour, that are equal to 60 seconds
3329.example: minutes to…, It's four minutes to six.
3329.translation: 分钟（一小时的六十分之一，等于60秒）

3330.definition: an act or event that does not follow the laws of nature and is believed to be caused by God
3330.example: the miracle of rising from the grave
3330.translation: 奇迹（不遵循自然法则且被认为是由神导致的行为或事件）

3331.definition: a piece of special flat glass that reflects images, so that you can see yourself when you look in it
3331.example: in the mirror, He looked at himself in the mirror.
3331.translation: 镜子（能反射影像的特殊平面玻璃）

3332.example: We were cold, wet and thoroughly miserable.
3332.translation: 痛苦的，悲惨的（非常不快乐或不舒服的）

3333.example: Fame brought her nothing but misery.
3333.translation: 痛苦，苦难（极大的身体或精神痛苦）

3334.definition: giving the wrong idea or impression and making you believe something that is not true
3334.translation: 误导性的（给出错误的想法或印象，使人相信不真实之事的）

3335.definition: to be or arrive too late for something
3335.example: If I don't leave now I'll miss my plane.
3335.translation: 错过，错过（迟到或未赶上某事，如飞机）

3336.definition: a weapon that is sent through the air and that explodes when it hits the thing that it is aimed at
3336.translation: 导弹（在空中发射并在击中目标时爆炸的武器）

3337.definition: that cannot be found or that is not in its usual place; that has been removed, lost or destroyed
3337.example: I never found the missing piece.
3337.translation: 失踪的，缺失的（找不到的或不在原处的；丢失或毁坏的）

3338.definition: that cannot exist or be done; not possible
3338.translation: 任务，使命（必须完成的特定任务或目标，尤指重要的）

3339.definition: an action or an opinion that is not correct, or that produces a result that you did not want
3339.example: It's easy to make a mistake.
3339.translation: 错误（不正确的行为或观点，或产生不想要结果的行为）

3340.definition: to not understand or judge somebody/something correctly
3340.example: mistake somebody/something, I admit that I mistook his intentions.
3340.translation: 弄错，误解（未能正确理解或判断某人/某物）

3341.definition: a combination of different people or things
3341.example: It's a school with a good social and ethnic mix of children.
3341.translation: 混合（不同人或物的结合）

3342.definition: if two or more substances or things mix or you mix them, they combine, usually in a way that means they cannot easily be separated
3342.example: Oil and water do not mix.
3342.translation: 混合（两种或多种物质结合在一起，通常指难以再分开）

3343.definition: consisting of different qualities or elements
3343.translation: 混合的（由不同的品质或元素组成的）

3344.example: She was a curious mixture, part grand lady, part wild child.
3344.translation: 混合物（不同事物的结合体）

3345.definition: a large crowd of people, especially one that may become violent or cause trouble
3345.translation: 暴民，暴民（一大群人，尤指可能变得暴力或引起混乱的）

3346.definition: connected with mobile phones, tablets, etc.
3346.translation: 移动的，手机的（与手机、平板电脑等相关的）

3348.definition: the ability to move easily from one place, social class or job to another
3348.translation: 流动性（从一处、一个阶层或一份工作轻松移动到另一处的能力）

3349.definition: to work together in order to achieve a particular aim; to organize a group of people to do this
3349.example: The unions mobilized thousands of workers in a protest against the cuts.
3349.translation: 动员（为了特定目的共同工作；或组织一群人这样做）

3350.definition: a particular way of doing something; a particular type of something
3350.translation: 模式，方式（做某事的特定方式或某物的特定类型）

3351.definition: a copy of something, usually smaller than the original object
3351.example: a working model (= one in which the parts move) of a fire engine
3351.translation: 模型，模型（事物的复制品，通常比原物小）

3352.definition: to create a copy or description of an activity, a situation, etc. so that you can study it before dealing with the real thing
3352.example: The program can model a typical home page for you.
3352.translation: 模拟（创建活动或情况的副本或描述以便研究）

3353.definition: that is neither very good, large, hot, etc. nor very bad, small, cold, etc.
3353.translation: 适度的，中等的（既不太好/大也不太坏/小的；中等的）

3354.definition: of the present time or recent times
3354.translation: 现代的（当今时代或近代的）

3355.definition: not very large, expensive, important, etc.
3355.translation: 谦虚的，适度的（不很大、不昂贵或不重要的）

3356.definition: the act or process of changing something in order to improve it or make it more acceptable; a change that is made
3356.example: Considerable modification of the existing system is needed.
3356.translation: 修改，改进（为了改进或使其更易接受而改变某事物的行为或改变本身）

3357.definition: to change something slightly, especially in order to make it more suitable for a particular purpose
3357.example: Patients are taught how to modify their diet.
3357.translation: 修改（微调某物，尤指为了使其更适合特定目的）

3358.definition: a very short period of time
3358.example: Could you wait a moment, please?
3358.translation: 时刻，瞬间（极短的一段时间）

3359.definition: the ability to keep increasing or developing
3359.example: The fight for his release gathers momentum each day.
3359.translation: 势头，动力（持续增长或发展的能力）

3360.definition: the day of the week after Sunday and before Tuesday, the first day of the working week
3360.translation: 星期一（周日之后、周二之前的一天）

3361.definition: what you earn by working or selling things, and use to buy things
3361.translation: 钱（通过工作或销售获得的用于购买东西的货币）

3362.definition: a screen that shows information from a computer; a television screen used to show particular kinds of information
3362.example: The details of today's flights are displayed on the monitor.
3362.translation: 显示器，监视器（显示电脑信息或特定电视信号的屏幕）

3363.definition: to watch and check something over a period of time in order to see how it develops, so that you can make any necessary changes
3363.example: monitor something, Each student's progress is closely monitored.
3363.translation: 监控，监视（在一段时间内观察并核实某事的发展，以便做出必要改变）

3364.definition: a member of a religious group of men who often live apart from other people in a monastery and who do not marry or have personal possessions
3364.translation: 修道士，僧侣（住在修道院中、不结婚、无私人财产的男性宗教团体成员）

3365.definition: an animal with a long tail, that climbs trees and lives in hot countries. There are several types of monkey and they are related to apes and humans.
3365.example: Like humans, apes and monkeys live in complex social groupings.
3365.translation: 猴子（生活在热带国家、会爬树的长尾动物，与类人猿及人类亲缘较近）

3366.definition: the complete control of trade in particular goods or the supply of a particular service; a type of goods or a service that is controlled in this way
3366.example: In the past central government had a monopoly on television broadcasting.
3366.translation: 垄断（对特定商品贸易或服务供应的完全控制）

3367.definition: (in stories) an imaginary creature that is very large, ugly and frightening
3367.translation: 怪物（故事中巨大、丑陋且令人恐惧的想象生物）

3368.definition: any of the twelve periods of time into which the year is divided, for example May or June
3368.example: The months of July and August are the hottest.
3368.translation: 月（一年分成的十二个时段之一，如五月或六月）

3369.definition: happening once a month or every month
3369.translation: 每月的（每月发生一次的或每个月的）

3370.definition: a building, column, statue, etc. built to remind people of a famous person or event
3370.example: A monument to him was erected in St Paul's Cathedral.
3370.translation: 纪念碑，历史遗迹（为纪念名人或重要事件而建的建筑、雕像等）

3371.definition: the way you are feeling at a particular time
3371.example: in a … mood, She's in a good mood today (= happy and friendly).
3371.translation: 情绪，心情（在特定时间的感觉）

3372.definition: the round object that moves around the earth once every 27½ days and shines at night by light reflected from the sun
3372.translation: 月亮（每27.3天绕地球一周、在夜间反射太阳光的球体）

3373.definition: connected with principles of right and wrong behaviour
3373.translation: 道德的（与对错行为原则相关的）

3374.definition: standards or principles of good behaviour, especially in matters of sexual relationships
3374.example: Young people these days have no morals.
3374.translation: 品行，道德（良好行为的标准或原则，尤指在性关系方面）

3375.definition: principles relating to right and wrong or good and bad behaviour
3375.translation: 道德（关于对错或好坏行为的原则）

3376.definition: used to form the comparative of most adjectives and adverbs with two or more syllables
3376.example: She was far more intelligent than her sister.
3376.translation: 更多地（用于构成多音节形容词和副词的比较级）

3377.definition: a larger number or amount of
3377.translation: 更多的（更大数量或金额的）

3378.definition: used with plural nouns and verbs, especially in negative sentences or in more formal English, to mean ‘a large number of’. Also used in questions to ask about the size of a number, and with ‘as’, ‘so’ and ‘too’.
3378.example: We don't have very many copies left.
3378.translation: 更多（更大数量或金额的）

3379.definition: used to introduce some new information that adds to or supports what you have said previously
3379.example: A talented artist, he was, moreover, a writer of some note.
3379.translation: 而且，此外（用于引入补充或支持前言的新信息）

3380.definition: the early part of the day from the time when people wake up until 12 o'clock in the middle of the day or before lunch
3380.example: They left for Spain early this morning.
3380.translation: 早晨，上午（从醒来到中午或午餐前的时间段）

3381.definition: a legal agreement by which a bank or similar organization lends you money to buy a house, etc., and you pay the money back over a particular number of years; the sum of money that you borrow
3381.example: to apply for/take out/pay off a mortgage
3381.translation: 抵押贷款（为了买房从银行借钱并分年归还的法律协议；所借款项）

3382.definition: a building where Muslims go to worship (= praise God)
3382.example: I used to pray at the local mosque with my father and grandfather.
3382.translation: 清真寺（穆斯林进行礼拜的建筑）

3383.definition: used to form the superlative of most adjectives and adverbs of two or more syllables
3383.translation: 最（用于构成多音节形容词和副词的最高级）

3384.definition: the largest in number or amount
3384.example: Who do you think will get (the) most votes?
3384.translation: 最多的（数量或金额最大的）

3385.definition: used with plural nouns and verbs, especially in negative sentences or in more formal English, to mean ‘a large number of’. Also used in questions to ask about the size of a number, and with ‘as’, ‘so’ and ‘too’.
3385.example: We don't have very many copies left.
3385.translation: 最多（数量或金额最大的）

3387.definition: a female parent of a child or animal; a person who is acting as a mother to a child
3387.example: I want to buy a present for my mother and father.
3387.translation: 母亲（孩子或动物的女性亲本；扮演母亲角色的人）

3388.definition: the act or process of moving or the way something moves
3388.example: What was Newton's first law of motion?
3388.translation: 运动，移动（移动的行为、过程或方式）

3389.definition: to be the reason why somebody does something or behaves in a particular way
3389.example: motivate somebody (to do something), What motivates people to carry out such attacks?
3389.translation: 激励，促使（成为某人做某事或以特定方式表现的原因）

3390.definition: the reason why somebody does something or behaves in a particular way
3390.example: motivation (behind something), What is the motivation behind this sudden change?
3390.translation: 动机（某人做某事或以特定方式表现的原因）

3391.example: There seemed to be no motive for the murder.
3391.translation: 动机，目的（做某事的理由）

3392.definition: having an engine; using the power of an engine
3392.example: The street is closed to motor vehicles.
3392.translation: 机动的（带引擎的；利用引擎动力的）

3393.definition: a device that uses electricity, petrol, etc. to produce movement and makes a machine, a vehicle, a boat, etc. work
3393.example: An electric motor is used to pump the water.
3393.translation: 马达，发动机（利用电、汽油等产生动力使机器、车辆等工作的装置）

3394.definition: a road vehicle with two wheels, driven by an engine, with one seat for the driver and often a seat for a passenger behind the driver
3394.example: He never learned to ride a motorcycle or to drive a car.
3394.translation: 摩托车（带引擎的两轮道路车辆，通常有前后座）

3395.example: The accident was reported by a passing motorist.

3396.example: Residents mounted a campaign to fight the plans.
3396.translation: 组织，发起（组织并开始某项活动，如发起运动）

3397.definition: a very high hill, often with rocks near the top
3397.translation: 山，山脉（非常高的山丘，顶部常有岩石）

3398.definition: a small animal that is covered in fur and has a long thin tail. Mice live in fields, in people’s houses or where food is stored.
3398.translation: 老鼠（覆盖皮毛、带长薄尾巴的小动物，生活在野外或建筑物内）

3399.definition: the opening in the face used for speaking, eating, etc.; the area inside the head behind this opening
3399.example: She opened her mouth to say something.
3399.translation: 嘴（脸上用于说话、进食的开口；头部的内部区域）

3400.definition: a change of place or position
3400.translation: 移动（地点或位置的改变）

3401.definition: to change position or make somebody/something change position in a way that can be seen, heard or felt
3401.translation: 移动（改变位置或使人/物改变位置，可被察觉）

3402.definition: an act of moving the body or part of the body
3402.translation: 运动，动作（身体或身体部位的移动行为）

3403.definition: a series of moving pictures recorded with sound that tells a story, watched at a movie theater or on a television or other device
3403.translation: 电影（记录有声音的、讲述故事的一系列移动画面）

3404.definition: causing strong, often sad, feelings about somebody/something
3404.translation: 动人的（引起强烈情感的，常指悲伤的情感）

3405.example: Thank you very much for the flowers.

3406.definition: used with uncountable nouns, especially in negative sentences to mean ‘a large amount of something’, or after ‘how’ to ask about the amount of something. It is also used with ‘as’, ‘so’ and ‘too’.
3406.example: I don't have much money with me.
3406.translation: 很多（用于不可数名词，尤用于否定句表示“大量的”）

3407.definition: used with plural nouns and verbs, especially in negative sentences or in more formal English, to mean ‘a large number of’. Also used in questions to ask about the size of a number, and with ‘as’, ‘so’ and ‘too’.
3407.example: We don't have very many copies left.

3408.definition: wet earth that is soft and sticky
3408.example: The car wheels got stuck in the mud.
3408.translation: 泥，泥浆（潮湿、柔软且黏稠的土地）

3409.definition: many in number; involving many different people or things
3409.example: The shape appears multiple times within each painting.
3409.translation: 多种的，倍数（数量很多的；涉及许多不同人或物的）

3410.definition: to add a number to itself a particular number of times
3410.example: The children are already learning to multiply and divide.
3410.translation: 乘，增加（将一个数与自身相加特定次数；使增加）

3412.definition: connected with or belonging to a town, city or district that has its own local government
3412.translation: 市政的，市的（与拥有地方政府的城镇或地区相关的）

3413.definition: the crime of killing somebody deliberately
3413.example: He was found guilty of murder.
3413.translation: 谋杀（蓄意杀死某人的罪行）

3414.definition: to kill somebody deliberately and illegally
3414.example: He denies murdering his wife's lover.
3414.translation: 谋杀（蓄意且非法地杀死某人）

3415.definition: a piece of body tissue that you make tight and relax in order to move a particular part of the body; the tissue that forms the muscles of the body
3415.translation: 肌肉（身体中通过收缩和舒张使部位移动的组织）

3416.definition: a building in which objects of artistic, cultural, historical or scientific interest are kept and shown to the public
3416.translation: 博物馆（保存并向公众展示艺术、文化、历史或科学物品的建筑）

3417.definition: sounds that are arranged in a way that is pleasant or exciting to listen to. People sing music or play it on instruments.
3417.example: I like any kind of pop or dance music.
3417.translation: 音乐（以令人愉快或兴奋的方式安排的声音，通过歌唱或乐器表现）

3418.translation: 音乐的（与音乐相关的；包含音乐的）

3419.definition: a play or film in which part or all of the story is told using songs and often dancing
3419.translation: 音乐剧（部分或全部故事通过歌曲和舞蹈讲述的戏剧或电影）

3420.definition: a person who plays a musical instrument or writes music, especially as a job
3420.translation: 音乐家（演奏乐器或创作音乐的人，尤指以此为业者）

3421.definition: used to say that something is necessary or very important (sometimes involving a rule or a law)
3421.example: All visitors must report to reception.
3421.translation: 必须（用于表示某事是必要的或非常重要的）

3422.definition: used to describe feelings that two or more people have for each other equally, or actions that affect two or more people equally
3422.translation: 相互的（用于描述两人间程度平等的感情或行动）

3423.definition: of or belonging to the speaker or writer
3423.translation: 我的（属于说话者或作者的）

3424.definition: used when the speaker or writer is also the person affected by an action
3424.example: I cut myself on a knife.
3424.translation: 我自己（当说话者同时也是动作的受影响者时使用）

3425.definition: difficult to understand or explain; strange
3425.translation: 神秘的（难以理解或解释的；奇怪的）

3426.definition: something that is difficult to understand or to explain
3426.example: It is one of the great unsolved mysteries of this century.
3426.translation: 神秘，谜（难以理解或解释的事物）

3427.definition: a story from ancient times, especially one that was told to explain natural events or to describe the early history of a people; this type of story
3427.translation: 神话（古代关于自然现象或早期历史的故事，真假不一）

3428.definition: the thin hard layer covering the outer tip of the fingers or toes
3428.translation: 指甲，钉子（手指或脚趾尖端的薄硬层；或金属钉）

3429.example: She was clutching the sheet around her naked body.
3429.translation: 裸体的（未穿任何衣服的）

3430.definition: a word or words that a particular person, animal, place or thing is known by
3430.translation: 名字（人、动物或地方被称呼的词语）

3431.definition: to give a name to somebody/something
3431.example: name somebody/something (after somebody), He was named after his father (= given his father's first name).
3431.translation: 命名（给某人/某物起名字）

3432.definition: used to introduce more exact and detailed information about something that you have just mentioned
3432.example: We need to concentrate on our target audience, namely women aged between 20 and 30.
3432.translation: 即，也就是（用于引入对刚提到事物的更精确详细的信息）

3433.definition: describing events or telling a story
3433.translation: 叙述性的（描述事件或讲述故事的）

3434.example: a gripping narrative of their journey up the Amazon
3434.translation: 叙事，故事（对事件的描述，尤指故事性的）

3435.definition: measuring a short distance from one side to the other, especially in relation to length
3435.example: Stray dogs wander the steep narrow lanes of the old town.
3435.translation: 狭窄的（从一侧到另一侧距离短的，尤指相对于长度而言）

3436.definition: to become or make something less wide
3436.example: This is where the river narrows.
3436.translation: 变窄（变窄或使某物变窄）

3437.translation: 下流的，糟糕的（非常坏或令人不快的）

3438.definition: a country considered as a group of people with the same language, culture and history, who live in a particular area under one government
3438.translation: 民族，国家（作为一个整体的、具有相同语言文化及政府的人群或国家）

3439.definition: connected with a particular nation; shared by a whole nation
3439.example: Decide whether it would be better to advertise in a national or a local newspaper.
3439.translation: 国家的（与特定民族相关的；全国共享的）

3440.definition: a citizen of a particular country

3441.definition: happening or existing in all parts of a particular country
3441.translation: 全国范围的（在特定国家的所有部分发生或存在的）

3442.definition: connected with the place where you were born and lived for the first years of your life
3442.translation: 本国的，本土的（与出生及度过早年生活的地方相关的）

3443.definition: a person who was born in a particular country or area
3443.translation: 本地人（出生在特定国家或地区的人）

3444.definition: existing in nature; not made or caused by humans
3444.example: the natural world (= of trees, rivers, animals and birds)
3444.translation: 自然的（自然界存在的；非人造的）

3445.definition: in a way that you would expect
3445.example: Naturally, I get upset when things go wrong.
3445.translation: 自然地（以预料中的方式）

3446.definition: all the plants, animals and things that exist in the universe that are not made by people
3446.example: Take time to appreciate the beauties of nature.
3446.translation: 自然（宇宙中存在的所有非人造的植物、动物及事物）

3447.definition: connected with the navy of a country
3447.translation: 海军的（与国家的海军相关的）

3448.definition: the skill or the process of planning a route for a ship or other vehicle and taking it there
3448.example: a maker of in-car navigation systems
3448.translation: 导航，航行（为船只或车辆规划路线并将其引向目的地的技能或过程）

3450.translation: 在附近（在较短的距离处）

3451.definition: at a short distance away from somebody/something
3451.translation: 在...附近（在离某人/某物较短的距离处）

3452.definition: near in position; not far away
3452.example: Her mother lived in a nearby town.
3452.translation: 附近的（位置靠近的；不远的）

3453.definition: a short distance from somebody/something; not far away
3453.translation: 在附近（离某人/某物距离不远地）

3455.definition: tidy and in order; carefully done or arranged
3455.example: She kept her desk extremely neat.
3455.translation: 整洁的（整洁有序的；细心安排的）

3456.definition: used to say that something cannot be avoided
3456.example: The number of places available is necessarily limited.
3456.translation: 必然地（用于表示某事无法回避）

3457.definition: that is needed for a purpose or a reason
3457.example: necessary to do something, It may be necessary to buy a new one.
3457.translation: 必要的（为了某种目的或理由所需要的）

3458.definition: the fact that something must happen or be done; the need for something
3458.example: necessity for something, We recognize the necessity for a written agreement.
3458.translation: 必要性（某事必须发生或执行的事实；对某物的需求）

3459.definition: the part of the body between the head and the shoulders
3459.example: He tied a scarf around his neck.
3459.translation: 脖子（头部与肩膀之间的身体部位）

3460.definition: a situation when something is necessary or must be done
3460.translation: 需要（某事必须执行或必要的情况）

3461.definition: to require something/somebody because they are essential or very important, not just because you would like to have them
3461.example: need something/somebody, Do you need any help?
3461.translation: 需要（需要某物/某人，因其必不可少或非常重要）

3462.definition: used to state that something is/was not necessary or that only very little is/was necessary; used to ask if something is/was necessary
3462.example: need (not) do something, You needn't bother asking Rick—I know he's too busy.
3462.translation: （情态动词）需要（用于说明某事不必执行或询问是否必要）

3463.definition: a small thin piece of steel that you use for sewing, with a point at one end and a hole for the thread at the other
3463.translation: 针（一端带尖头、另一端带孔供穿线的细钢片，用于缝纫）

3464.example: The crisis had a negative effect on trade.
3464.translation: 负面的，消极的（坏的或有害的）

3465.definition: a word or statement that means ‘no’; an act of refusing to do something or of denying something
3465.example: in the negative, She answered in the negative (= said ‘no’).
3465.translation: 否定（表示“不”的词语或陈述；拒绝或否认的行为）

3466.definition: the fact of not giving enough care or attention to something/somebody; the state of not receiving enough care or attention
3466.example: The buildings are crumbling from years of neglect.
3466.translation: 忽视，疏忽（未给予足够照料或关注的事实；未受照料的状态）

3467.definition: to fail to take care of somebody/something
3467.translation: 忽视，遗弃（未能照顾好某人/某物）

3468.definition: to try to reach an agreement by formal discussion
3468.example: negotiate (with somebody) (for something), The government will not negotiate with terrorists.
3468.translation: 谈判（通过正式讨论尝试达成协议）

3469.definition: formal discussion between people who are trying to reach an agreement
3469.translation: 谈判（尝试达成协议的人们之间的正式讨论）

3470.definition: a person who lives next to you or near you
3470.example: We've had a lot of support from all our friends and neighbours.
3470.translation: 邻居（住在你旁边或附近的人）

3471.definition: a district or an area of a town; the people who live there
3471.example: We grew up in the same neighbourhood.
3471.translation: 社区，街区（城镇的一个区或区域；其中的居民）

3472.definition: located or living near or next to a place or person
3472.translation: 邻近的（位于或居住在某处/某人附近的）

3473.definition: used to show that a negative statement is also true of somebody/something else
3473.example: He didn't remember and neither did I.
3473.translation: 也不（用于表示否定陈述同样适用于他人/他物）

3474.definition: not one nor the other of two things or people
3474.translation: 两者都不（两者中没有一个）

3475.definition: not one nor the other of two things or people
3475.translation: 两者都不（两者中没有一个）

3476.definition: any of the long fibres that carry messages between the brain and parts of the body, enabling you to move, feel pain, etc.
3476.translation: 神经（在大脑与身体部位间传递信息、使能移动及感知疼痛的纤维）

3477.definition: anxious about something or afraid of something
3477.example: I felt really nervous before the interview.
3477.translation: 紧张的（对某事感到忧虑或害怕的）

3478.definition: a hollow place or structure that a bird makes or chooses for laying its eggs in and sheltering its young
3478.example: sparrows building a nest of twigs and dry grass
3478.translation: 鸟巢（鸟类为了产卵和育雏而建造或选择的中空结构）

3479.definition: a net amount of money is the amount that remains when nothing more is to be taken away
3479.translation: 净的（扣除所有项后剩余的数额，如净利润）

3480.definition: material that is made of string, thread or wire twisted or tied together, with small spaces in between; a piece of this material used for a particular purpose
3480.example: Unfortunately the animals are often caught in fishing nets.
3480.translation: 网（由绳、线等拧成带小孔的材料；这种材料制成的工具）

3481.definition: a complicated system of roads, lines, tubes, nerves, etc. that are connected to each other and operate together
3481.translation: 网络（相互连接并共同运行的道路、线路、管道或神经系统）

3482.definition: not supporting or helping either side in a disagreement, competition, etc.
3482.example: Journalists are supposed to be politically neutral.
3482.translation: 中立的（在分歧、竞争中不偏袒任何一方的）

3483.definition: not at any time; not on any occasion
3483.translation: 从不（在任何时间都不；在任何场合都不）

3484.definition: despite something that you have just mentioned
3484.example: There is little chance that we will succeed in changing the law. Nevertheless, it is important that we try.
3484.translation: 尽管如此（尽管刚提到的某事）

3485.definition: not existing before; recently made, invented, introduced, etc.
3485.example: Have you read her new novel?
3485.translation: 新的（以前不存在的；最近制造、发明或引入的）

3487.definition: new information about something that has happened recently
3487.translation: 新闻，消息（关于最近发生之事的最新信息）

3488.definition: a report containing news of the activities of a club or organization that is sent regularly to all its members
3488.example: Our sailing club produces a monthly newsletter.
3488.translation: 简报，通讯（包含俱乐部或组织活动新闻并定期发给成员的报告）

3489.definition: a set of large printed sheets of paper, or a website, containing news, articles, advertisements, etc. and published every day or every week; the organization responsible for producing this
3489.translation: 报纸（每天或每周出版的包含新闻文章的纸张或网站；其制作机构）

3490.definition: coming straight after somebody/something in time, order or space
3490.example: The next train to Baltimore is at ten.
3490.translation: 下一个（在时间、顺序或空间上紧随其后的）

3491.translation: 接下来（在另一件事之后；然后）

3492.definition: a person or thing that is next
3492.example: One moment he wasn't there, the next he was.
3492.translation: 下一个（紧接在后的那个人或事物）

3493.definition: in or into a position right by somebody/something
3493.example: We sat next to each other.
3493.translation: 在...旁边（紧挨着某人/某物的位置）

3494.translation: 好的，迷人的（愉快或吸引人的）

3495.definition: a comfortable or suitable role, job, way of life, etc.
3495.example: He eventually found his niche in sports journalism.
3495.translation: 利基，合适的地位（舒适或合适的角色、工作或生活方式）

3496.definition: the time between one day and the next when it is dark, when people usually sleep
3496.example: at night, These animals only come out at night.
3496.translation: 夜晚（天黑到次日天明、通常人们睡觉的时间段）

3497.definition: a dream that is very frightening or unpleasant
3497.example: He still has nightmares about the accident.
3497.translation: 噩梦（非常可怕或令人不快的梦）

3498.example: There are only nine of these rare animals left.

3500.example: The temperature must be in the nineties today.

3501.definition: not one; not any; not a
3501.example: No student is to leave the room.
3501.translation: 没有，不（不一个；没有任何；一个也没有）

3502.definition: used to give a negative reply or statement
3502.translation: 不（用于给出否定的回答或陈述）

3504.definition: having or showing fine personal qualities that people admire, such as courage, honesty and care for others
3504.translation: 高尚的，贵族的（具有人们钦佩的优秀品质，如勇气、诚实和博爱）
